description: A long-established restaurant with a renowned reputation thanks to the enthusiasm of the family at the helm and the excellent cuisine on offer. The carefully designed menu focuses mainly on classic regional dishes, yet also includes more contemporary options and even a few fish-based specialities, while the impressive wine list features more than 1 000 different labels, including some surprising names and various vertical wine-tasting options.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
